name: Sausage 'n Kraut
author: KHOERNER
summary: A great and super fast German dish with a sweet and sour flavor. Serve piping hot with your choice of sides.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package pork sausage, halved and cut into 4-inch pieces
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate
Grill the sausages on the preheated grill until browned, about 3 minutes on each side
Cut the cooked sausage into 1/2-inch slices
While the sausage is grilling, melt the butter spread in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Stir in the sauerkraut, celery flakes, onion, caraway seeds, brown sugar, and pepper
Cook and stir until the sauerkraut begins to brown, about 10 minutes
